mapper.sql: id, fees_no, waybill_no, outstock_no, external_no, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, carrierid, carrier_name, deliveryid, deliver_name,subject_code,other_subject_code, unpacking, unpack_num, delivery_date, temperature_type, bill_type, b2b_flag, total_weight, total_quantity, total_varieties, split_single, template_id, price_id, amount, bill_no, rule_no, to_province_name, to_district_name, to_city_name, charged_weight, weight_limit, unit_price, head_weight, continued_weight, head_price, continued_price, accept_time, sign_time,biz_type, bigstatus, smallstatus, param1, param2, param3, param4, param5, status, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag,amount,derate_amount,is_calculated
mapper.select:
select
from fees_receive_dispatch where del_flag = '0'

select warehouse_code as warehouseCode,carrierid, count(1) as count,sum(amount) as amount,sum(derate_amount) as derateAmount from fees_receive_dispatch where del_flag = '0'
group by warehouse_code,carrierid

select
from fees_receive_dispatch where del_flag = '0'
limit 1
select sum(amount) as totalCost from fees_receive_dispatch where 1=1 and del_flag = '0' and subject_code='de_delivery_amount'
mapper.insert: insert into fees_receive_dispatch( fees_no, waybill_no, outstock_no, external_no, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, carrierid, carrier_name, deliveryid, deliver_name,subject_code,other_subject_code, unpacking, unpack_num, delivery_date, temperature_type, bill_type, b2b_flag, total_weight, total_quantity, total_varieties, split_single, template_id, price_id, amount, bill_no, rule_no, to_province_name, to_district_name, to_city_name, charged_weight, weight_limit, unit_price, head_weight, continued_weight, head_price, continued_price, accept_time, sign_time,biz_type, bigstatus, smallstatus, param1, param2, param3, param4, param5, status, is_calculated, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag) values ( #{feesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outstockNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{externalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherSubjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unpacking,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unpackNum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{temperatureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{b2bFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalVarieties,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{splitSingle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toProvinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toDistrictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargedWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{weightLimit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{headWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{continuedWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{headPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{continuedPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{acceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update fees_receive_dispatch
bill_no=#{billNo}, status=#{status},
last_modifier=#{lastModifier},
last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select carrierid,bill_no as billNo,sum(amount) as amount from fees_receive_dispatch where del_flag = '0' and bill_no=#{billNo} and is_calculated in ('1','5') group by carrierid,bill_no

select frd.fees_no, frd.waybill_no, bd.outstock_no, bd.external_no, bd.warehouse_code, bd.warehouse_name, frd.customerid, frd.customer_name, frd.carrierid, frd.carrier_name, frd.deliveryid, frd.deliver_name,frd.subject_code,frd.other_subject_code, frd.unpacking, frd.unpack_num, frd.delivery_date, frd.temperature_type, frd.bill_type, frd.b2b_flag, frd.total_weight, frd.total_quantity, frd.total_varieties, frd.split_single, frd.amount, frd.bill_no, frd.rule_no, frd.to_province_name, frd.to_district_name, frd.to_city_name, frd.charged_weight, frd.weight_limit, frd.unit_price, frd.head_weight, frd.continued_weight, frd.head_price, frd.continued_price, frd.create_time, bd.totalqty as totalQuantity,bd.product_detail as productDetail,frd.bigstatus,frd.smallstatus,frd.biz_type, frs.cost as orderOperatorAmount,bom.bill_type_name as billTypeName,bd.receive_name,bd.zexpressnum,bdc.duty_type,bdc.update_reason_detail, (frd.amount-frd.derate_amount) as discountAmount from fees_receive_dispatch frd LEFT JOIN biz_dispatch_bill bd on frd.fees_no = bd.fees_no LEFT JOIN biz_outstock_master bom on frd.waybill_no = bom.waybill_no and frd.outstock_no = bom.outstock_no LEFT JOIN fees_receive_storage frs ON frs.fees_no = bom.fees_no and frs.subject_code = 'wh_b2c_work' LEFT JOIN biz_dispatch_carrier_change bdc on frd.waybill_no=bdc.waybill_no where frd.del_flag = '0' and bd.del_flag='0' and frd.subject_code='de_delivery_amount' and frd.bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.warehouse_name, a.customer_name, a.outstock_no, a.external_no, a.waybill_no, a.create_time, a.zexpressnum, ifnull(b.total_weight,a.total_weight) total_weight, a.totalqty as totalQuantity, a.product_detail, b.carrier_name, a.receive_name, b.to_province_name, b.to_district_name, b.to_city_name, a.temperature_type_code as temperature_type, b.charged_weight, b.head_price, b.continued_price, b.amount, c.cost as orderOperatorAmount, e.duty_type, e.update_reason_detail, d.is_calculated as storageCal, d.remark as storageRemark, a.is_calculated as dispatchCal, a.remark as dispatchRemark, (b.amount-IFNULL(b.derate_amount,0)) as discountAmount, f.servicename as serviceTypeName, (c.cost-IFNULL(c.derate_amount,0)) as operateAmount from biz_dispatch_bill a left join fees_receive_dispatch b on a.fees_no=b.fees_no and b.del_flag='0' left join biz_outstock_master d on d.waybill_no=a.waybill_no and d.del_flag='0' and d.b2b_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN fees_receive_storage c ON c.fees_no = d.fees_no and c.del_flag='0' LEFT JOIN biz_dispatch_carrier_change e on a.waybill_no=e.waybill_no LEFT JOIN pub_carrier_servicetype f on b.service_type_code=f.servicecode and f.delflag='0' and b.carrierid=f.carrierid where a.del_flag='0' and a.customerid=#{customerId} and a.create_time>=#{startTime} and a.create_time<#{endTime}

select bill_no as billNo, warehouse_code as warehouseCode, carrierid as subjectCode, carrier_name as subjectName,sum(amount) as totalAmount,count(0) as num from fees_receive_dispatch where del_flag = '0' and bill_no=#{billNo} group by bill_no,warehouse_code,carrierid,carrier_name
mapper.update: update fees_receive_dispatch set bill_no='',status='0',derate_amount=0 where bill_no=#{billNo} and warehouse_code=#{warehouseCode} and carrierid=#{subjectCode} and del_flag=0
update fees_receive_dispatch set bill_no='',status=0,derate_amount=0 where id=#{id}
update fees_receive_dispatch set derate_amount=#{derateAmount} where id=#{id}
update fees_receive_dispatch set bill_no=#{billNo},status=#{status} where fees_no = #{feesNo}
update fees_receive_dispatch set derate_amount=#{derateAmount} where id=#{id}
